GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.10.99
GSD.description:
iommu/vt-d: Fix potential memory leak in intel_setup_irq_remapping()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.99 by commit 9d9995b0371e4e8c18d4f955479e5d47efe7b2d4, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit e3beca48a45b5e0e6e6a4e0124276b8248dcc9bb. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: iommu/vt-d: Fix potential memory leak in intel_setup_irq_remapping()
